descriptionHtml:
[b]Practicamente es una raza con base en los Argonianos que agrega independiente las texturas de Drachis para una raza nueva de Draconianos, esta raza contiene sus ventajas propias en habilidades, en resumen son la contra parte de los Argonianos, agrega armaduras y seguidores, [u][i]modifica el hechizo del matrimonio[/i][/u]. Se necesita DB & DG, Si anteriormente instalaste "Argorok Draconian Follower", solo borra el archivo ESP para evitar la clonacion.

It is practically a race based on Argonians that independently adds the Drachis textures to a new race of Draconians, this race contains its own advantages in abilities, in short they are the counterpart of the Argonians, add armor and followers, [u][i]modify the spell of marriage[/i][/u]. DB & DG is needed, If you previously installed "Argorok Draconian Follower", just delete the ESP file to avoid cloning.

Credits:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/341894]AlexScorpion[/url] SnakeBows
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2342239]Mikanoshi[/url] Snake Battle Axe

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5501931]Snikkmorder[/url] Drachis Texture Female
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2283672]Acolyte598[/url] Silver Armor
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/383710]Nikinoodles[/url] Cloaks of Skyrim
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2695796]stormshallow[/url] Sword of Auriel
Bethesda Original Work [/b]
author: Krookodile Belmonth
